content:
These are the power cut time tables for the next two days (Wednesday the 16th and Thursday the 17th, 2016). The cuts will be 5 and a half hours during the day and 2 hours at night.
Who is in Group A and B?

In Colombo District the city is basically spared. If you're in Battaramulla (Sri Jayawardenapura) you're basically screwed. Otherwise Ratmalana, Dehiwala and Homagama are affected as well.
This info is from the CEB via the Daily Mirror on its SMS news alerts. Ada Derana attributes the times to Minister of Power and Renewable Energy Ranjith Siyambalapitiya. We also doublechecked on Twitter.
